properties.displayName: AWS - Successful administrator logins outside working hours - [Final_V1.0]
properties.query:
let startHour = 5;
let endHour = 20;
AWSCloudTrail
| where EventName contains "login"
| extend hour = datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)
| extend dayNum = dayofweek(TimeGenerated)
| extend dayName = case(
	dayNum == "0.00:00:00", "Sun",
	dayNum == "1.00:00:00", "Mon",
	dayNum == "2.00:00:00", "Tue",
	dayNum == "3.00:00:00", "Wed",
	dayNum == "4.00:00:00", "Thu",
	dayNum == "5.00:00:00", "Fri",
	"Sat"
)
| where (hour >= endHour or hour <= startHour) or (dayName in ("Sat", "Sun"))
| where parse_json(ResponseElements).ConsoleLogin <> "Failure"
| extend UserPrincipalName = tostring(split(UserIdentityPrincipalid,':')[1]), DirectoryRole = tostring(split(SessionIssuerUserName,'_')[1])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserPrincipalName
| extend completeDate = strcat(dayName, " ", format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss"))
| project completeDate, UserPrincipalName
